text:
Teladoc | Purchase, NY | Full-time, On-Site | Jr/Sr DevOps Engineer | $80-$140k

What We Do: non-emergency, phone, video and messaging doctor consultations (and more+). TL;DR; - telehealth.

Since I joined Teladoc, we have had fabled hockeystick growth in usage, staff, acquisitions and revenue. We IPOd 2 years ago with no end in sight. I would love to bring in someone this month. Come help me build DevOps on a rocketship!

https://github.com/zishan/devops-exercise zahmad(at)teladoc.com

p.s. also looking for sr software engineers
